short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's free tool to compress and zip all Images together in very impressive, simple and super fast speed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Photo resize compress and zip
-----------------------------------------------------

Just drag and drop your images to the windows and pack it up.
No more step and effort you pay. We simplify your life and work.
It's a free online tool for compressing your images with batch and 
download it with zip file in super fast speed.
No software to download. All you need is your updated browsers (Firefox & Chrome).
Supported file types are : gif, jpg, jpeg, png.

Step 1: Drag and drop your photos to the windows.
Step 2: Click "Pack it up" button for download all photos with zip file.

----------------------------------
What we did behind you?
* Reduce the image size less than 1MB to save your space and bandwidth.
* Compress image with best ratio without affect original image quality.
* Batch zip and download all your compressed images together.
* Retain Jpeg EXIF information after images compression & resize.
* Google App for mobile/tablet

----------------------------------
[ Remarkable features ]
* Super Fast Speed
* Batch Processing
* Best Image Compression
* Retain Jpeg EXIF
